mainnet.name: Mainnet
mainnet.pros: reliable, fast, works with all wallets
mainnet.cons: not free to use (but very cheap)

npmton.name: npm ton (JavaScript)
npmton.pros: more popular, full TypeScript support, elegant api
npmton.cons: no support for all ton services

tonweb.name: TonWeb (JavaScript)
tonweb.pros: maintained by core team, supports ton services
